Rulings.Edison:
● You can't discard this card to the GY if "Dimensional Fissure" is applying.
● If this card targets "Necro Gardna" during your turn, "Necro Gardna" can be chained to this effect.
● The Summon of "Machina Fortress" does not use the Chain. This card can't be chained to it.
Rulings.Tengu:

● The Summon of "Machina Fortress" does not use the Chain. This card cannot be chained to it.

Rulings.Meadowlands:
This format does not use Trigger Location rulings. 
Cards do not need to be in the same location as their effects for those effects to trigger.
● EG: You discard an "Atlantean" Monster to activate a "Mermail" effect.
  Even if "D.D. Crow" is chained, banishing the Atlantean Monster, that Atlantean Monster's effect will still activate.


● You can't discard this card to the GY if "Dimensional Fissure" is applying.
● If this card targets "Necro Gardna" during your turn, "Necro Gardna" can be chained to this effect.
● The Summon of "Machina Fortress" does not use the Chain. This card cannot be chained to it.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'D.D. Crow's' effect is a Quick Effect.
● Discarding “D.D. Crow” to activate its effect is a cost.
● You can't activate this effect during the Damage Step.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "D.D. Crow" is a Quick Effect.\n2. Discarding "D.D. Crow" to activate its effect is a cost.\n3. You cannot activate this effect during the Damage Step.

PSCT.Edison: ① (Quick): You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish that target.
PSCT.Tengu: ① (Quick): You can discard this card to the GY, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish that target.
